name: The Death Cycle: The Monks of Outlook Abbey
name_original: The Death Cycle: The Monks of Outlook Abbey
description:
You will die often in this game, but that's okay--dying merely sends the hero back to the start.

But this time, the hero remembers everything that just happened, leading to their death. Maybe they've learned something that will help them avoid death in the future.

And maybe they can exploit this ability to learn things they otherwise could not...
